quote: La eternidad es solo lo presente, este estar en las cosas con olvido.

author: Banana Yoshimoto
quote: I believe that the human heart is the most interesting thing there is on this earth.

author: Gülten Akın
quote: Yaşamak tanıklık etmektir.

author: Antonio Gramsci
quote: Istruitevi, perché avremo bisogno di tutta la nostra intelligenza.

author: Sylvia Plath
quote: Perhaps when we find ourselves wanting everything, it is because we are dangerously close to wanting nothing.

author: Marguerite Duras
quote: Écrire, c'est aussi ne pas parler. C'est se taire. C'est hurler sans bruit.

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
quote: We are our choices.

author: Theodor W. Adorno
quote: Es gibt kein richtiges Leben im falschen.

author: Oktay Rifat
quote: Yaşadıklarımı gizledim, hayallerimle yaşadım.

author: E.M. Forster
quote: Only connect.

author: Ernesto Sabato
quote: El amor es tan ambivalente que puede llevarnos al infierno o al paraíso, pero nunca nos deja inmóviles.

author: Natalia Ginzburg
quote: Le relazioni fra gli esseri umani sono avvolte in una fitta nebbia.

author: Nikolai Gogol
quote: Чуден Днепр при тихой погоде.

author: Fereydoon Moshiri
quote: میان ماندن و رفتن، همیشه فاصله‌ای هست، در قدم‌های آخر جا می‌ماند دلی که عاشق مانده است.

author: Cao Xueqin

author: Alice Munro
quote: The constant happiness is curiosity.

author: Frantz Fanon

author: Murathan Mungan
quote: En nihayetinde, unutulan her aşk, bir tür intihar.

author: Natsume Sōseki

author: May Ziadeh
quote: في النسيان راحة, ولكن من ذا يستطيع أن ينسى؟

author: Adélia Prado

author: Kiran Desai
quote: The present changes the past. Looking back you do not find what you left behind.

author: Thomas Bernhard

author: Orhan Kemal
quote: İnsan insanın kurdu değil, kardeşidir.

author: Zadie Smith
quote: The very reason I write is so that I might not sleepwalk through my entire life.

author: Elena Poniatowska
quote: Nada me parece más ajeno a mí que la palabra resignación. No me resigno, no me conformo, no me entrego.

author: Alexander Blok
quote: Ночь, улица, фонарь, аптека, бессмысленный и тусклый свет.

author: Ben Okri
quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.

author: Nathalie Sarraute
quote: Les mots servent à libérer une matière silencieuse qui est bien plus vaste que les mots.

author: Edip Cansever
quote: Sonra birden, bir gün bir aynada, ben sıradan bir insandım.

author: Jhumpa Lahiri
quote: That's the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet.

author: Andrea Camilleri
quote: Leggere è viaggiare senza avere problemi di bagagli.

author: Eileen Chang

author: Pablo Neruda
quote: You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep Spring from coming.

author: Augusto Monterroso
quote: Cuando despertó, el dinosaurio todavía estaba allí.

author: Selim İleri
quote: Anı kağıttan bir gemidir. Batma tehlikesi her an vardır.

author: Samad Behrangi
quote: برای ماهی کوچولو، دریا خیلی بزرگ بود.

quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.

author: Elias Canetti

author: Anton Chekhov
quote: Краткость — сестра таланта.

author: Sandra Cisneros
quote: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.

author: Marcel Proust

author: Yasunari Kawabata
quote: わたしも寂しい。あなたも寂しい。人間はみんな寂しいのだ。

quote: When suffering knocks at your door and you say there is no seat for him, he tells you not to worry because he has brought his own stool.

author: Tayeb Salih
quote: الإنسان في هذه الدنيا إما غالب أو مغلوب.

author: Ahmet Hamdi Tanpınar
quote: Ne içindeyim zamanın, ne de büsbütün dışında.

author: Eudora Welty

author: Chico Buarque

author: José Saramago
quote: Lo más importante en la vida no es la meta sino el camino.

author: Federico García Lorca

author: Elsa Morante
quote: Non c'è niente di più bello che inventare cose che non esistono.

author: Metin Altıok
quote: İnsan en çok gitmekten korkar, gitmek en çok ölüme benzer.

author: Audre Lorde
quote: I am not free while any woman is unfree, even when her shackles are very different from my own.

author: Georges Perec

author: Elizabeth Hardwick
quote: The greatest gift is the passion for reading. It is cheap, it consoles, it distracts, it excites, it gives you knowledge of the world and experience of a wide kind.

author: Max Frisch
quote: Zeit ist das, was man an der Uhr abliest.

author: Özdemir Asaf

author: Grace Paley

author: Cristina Peri Rossi

author: Dino Buzzati

author: Ilya Ehrenburg

author: Simin Daneshvar
quote: آب که سرباالبرود، قورباغه ابوعطا می‌خواند.

author: Bai Juyi
quote: 感时花溅泪，恨别鸟惊心。

author: Albert Camus

author: Sevim Burak
quote: Küçük bir çıkış arıyorum, küçücük bir kapı.

author: Junichirō Tanizaki
quote: 無理して機嫌を取るより、素直に憂鬱な顔をしていれば良いのだ。

author: Hanif Kureishi

author: Fadwa Tuqan
quote: أعطني حباً يا قلبي، فالحب قانوني الأعلى.

author: Mia Couto

author: Carson McCullers

author: Ernst Jünger
quote: Gedanken kommen oft zurück, Gefühle nie.

author: İlhami Çiçek
quote: Her insan, içinde asla yanıtlayamayacağı sorularla ölür.

author: Marilynne Robinson

author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
quote: Escribir es llevar a su perfección el lenguaje de cada día.

author: Maxim Gorky
quote: В жизни всегда есть место подвигу.

author: A.S. Byatt
quote: What is a life story? A collection of events, memories strung on a self, like beads on a necklace.

author: Jacques Derrida

author: Leslie Marmon Silko

author: Laozi

author: Nuruddin Farah

author: Dulce María Loynaz
quote: El amor es el más terrible y el más dulce de los fantasmas.

author: İlhan Berk

author: Stefan Zweig
quote: Das Geheimnis der Erlösung heißt Erinnerung.

author: Mikhail Bulgakov
quote: Никогда и ничего не просите! Никогда и ничего, и в особенности у тех, кто сильнее вас.

author: Cormac McCarthy
quote: You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from.

author: Paul Éluard
quote: Il n'y a pas de hasard, il n'y a que des rendez-vous.

author: Yukio Mishima
quote: 私たちは皆、遅れてきた天才です。

author: Gwendolyn Brooks
quote: We are each other's harvest; we are each other's business; we are each other's magnitude and bond.

author: Taha Hussein
quote: الكتب كالأصدقاء، قليل منها غني عن الكثير، وكثير منها لا غناء فيه عن القليل.

quote: Hayat, tutku olmayınca anlamını yitirir.

author: Edwidge Danticat

author: Graciliano Ramos
quote: Não me arrependo, não me arrependo de nada. Nem dos erros que cometi, porque foram para a verdade.

author: Silvina Ocampo
quote: La memoria es una forma del olvido, el olvido es una forma de la memoria.

author: Simone Weil

author: Forough Farrokhzad
quote: من از حاشیه‌های خالی می‌ترسم، من از فاصله‌های خالی می‌ترسم.

author: Qian Zhongshu

author: Alejandro Zambra
quote: Each book is the ruin of the previous book.

author: Léopold Sédar Senghor
quote: L'émotion est nègre, comme la raison est hellène.

author: Leyla Erbil
quote: Yaşamak bir yanıttır, ölüm bir soru.

author: Osamu Dazai
quote: 人間失格。

author: Colson Whitehead

quote: Was ist das: dieses Zu-sich-selber-Kommen des Menschen?

quote: Hayatın uzun tırmanışında, bazılarımız tırmanırken bazılarımız düşer, bazılarımız düşerken bazılarımız tırmanır.

author: Sergio Pitol
quote: Escribir es construir una casa donde otros puedan habitar.

author: Boris Pasternak
quote: Никогда, никогда не думай, что ты иной, чем остальные, потому что это неверно: ты такой же.

author: Elsa Morante
quote: La realtà è sempre irreale.

author: Tang Xianzu
quote: 情不知所起，一往而深。

author: W.G. Sebald

author: Sergei Dovlatov

author: Roberto Arlt
quote: ¿Qué es la vida? Un problema que no se puede resolver con la muerte.

author: Julia Kristeva

author: Claudio Magris
quote: Vivere significa perdersi nel labirinto.

author: Vüs'at O. Bener
quote: İnsan, sırlarını kendinden bile saklar kimi zaman.

author: George Saunders
quote: Don't be afraid to be confused. Try to remain permanently confused. Anything is possible.

author: Édouard Glissant
quote: J'appelle Créolisation le métissage des cultures qui produit de l'inattendu.

author: Karl Ove Knausgård
quote: For the heart, life is simple: it beats for as long as it can. Then it stops.

author: Peter Handke
quote: Die Stunde, da wir nichts voneinander wußten.

author: Didem Madak
quote: Beni ben yapan yalnızlığımdır, yalnızlığımı ben yapan başkaları.

author: Jenny Erpenbeck
quote: Sometimes, in moments of utmost clarity, I understood that I was nobody.

author: Juan José Saer
quote: La literatura es la forma más compleja que tiene la palabra para luchar contra su propia condición perecedera.

author: Andrea Zanzotto
quote: La poesia è un bene comune e deve essere tenuta viva.

author: Viktor Pelevin
quote: Истина не то, что можно найти или открыть. Это то, что можно использовать.

author: Herta Müller
quote: When we don't speak, said Edgar, we become unbearable, and when we do, we make fools of ourselves.

author: Bijan Jalali
quote: شب‌های تنهایی، شبانی است که گله ستارگان می‌چراند.

author: Bei Dao
quote: 别相信我说的话，但也别忘记。

quote: Books are the way that we communicate with the dead. The way that we learn lessons from those who are no longer with us.

author: Boualem Sansal

author: Sema Kaygusuz

author: Yōko Ogawa
quote: 言葉を失うということは、自分自身を失うということだ。

author: Zakaria Tamer
quote: البحر ليس ماء فقط، البحر حلم أيضًا.

author: Conceição Evaristo
quote: Escrevo para registrar o que os outros apagam quando falo.

quote: What a long way it is from one life to another, yet why write if not for that distance?

author: Jenny Erpenbeck
quote: Heimat ist das, was gesprochen wird.

author: Küçük İskender
quote: Aşk tesadüfen karşımıza çıkmaz. Aşkı biz icat ederiz.

author: Marlon James
quote: People think that they tell stories, but stories often tell them.

author: César Aira
quote: La realidad es siempre una hipótesis.

author: Lyudmila Ulitskaya

author: Leila Slimani
quote: The baby is dead. It took only a few seconds.

author: Annie Ernaux
quote: Écrire, c'est le dernier recours quand on a trahi.

author: Haydar Ergülen
quote: Şiir, insanın kendini aradığı yalnızlığın adıdır.

author: Ocean Vuong
quote: Sometimes being offered tenderness feels like the very proof that you've been ruined.

author: Elena Ferrante
quote: Chi s'è strappato o è stato strappato dall'habitat originario resta ferito per sempre.

author: Xi Xi
quote: 也许每一滴雨水都是一个宇宙。

author: Valeria Luiselli
quote: There is nothing more dangerous, nothing more powerful, nothing more necessary and essential for survival than the act of storytelling.

author: Mariana Enriquez
quote: Todos somos fantasmas, aunque todavía no estemos muertos.

author: Hakan Günday
quote: İnsanın en ağır yükü, başkasının hayallerini taşımaktır.

author: Bijan Najdi
quote: چه کسی گفته چشم‌ها برای دیدن است؟ چشم‌ها برای گریستن است.

quote: Hope is a contraband passed from hand to hand and story to story.

author: Judith Hermann
quote: Die Menschheit ist immer eine Entscheidung.

author: Evgeny Vodolazkin
quote: Время – это испытание, которое мало кто выдерживает.

author: Haruki Murakami
quote: If you can't understand it without an explanation, you can't understand it with an explanation.

author: Marie NDiaye
quote: Voilà que je suis seul avec mon sang, seul avec cette envie de pleurer qui me monte à la gorge.

author: Mieko Kawakami
quote: 人との出会いも、何でもそうだけど、タイミングっていうのが大事なのかもしれない。

author: Richard Powers

author: Hassan Blasim
quote: الحياة بسيطة، لكننا نحن من نجعلها معقدة.

author: İhsan Oktay Anar

author: Sally Rooney
quote: I don't think your generation will ever understand how difficult things were for us.

author: Rubem Fonseca
quote: O certo é que nesse mundo não existe nada certo, só existem histórias.

author: Valeria Luiselli
quote: Todas las ciudades, las verdaderas, las inventadas por otros, atiborradas de personas, son siempre las ciudades de la soledad.

author: Bernardine Evaristo
quote: The problem with history is that it's not in the past.

author: Erri De Luca
quote: Siamo ancora prigionieri di una memoria che non è nostra.

author: Barış Bıçakçı
quote: Bizi teselli eden yalnızca bizi kırandır.

author: Viet Thanh Nguyen
quote: All wars are fought twice, the first time on the battlefield, the second time in memory.

author: Kamel Daoud
quote: Le monde n'est pas un livre, c'est un labyrinthe.
